ASCII_ART_Video_Console_Player
The program is an ASCII art video playerand is implemented by console.

The example of ASCII ART:

88888888888888888888H88000HH0TH8HH0000TTTTTTTTT00000T0000TTTTTVVVTT000000000000000T0000000000000000T+T000VT0H88880VTTTT+VTTTTTTTTTTTTTTVVVVVVV++VVVVVVVVVi1+VVVTTTTVTTTTTTVTTVVTTTTTTTTTTTi+TTTTT
